name: Terminus Dusk (Demo 0.1)
description:
A strange beam of light  has erupted out of Dusk Isle. While nobody seems to know how or why it happened, a lurking threat starts to loom over the Temple of Healing. The temple's Life Energy might be in danger, and it's up to three heroes to find the source of this light.

Play through the first area as Luxxos, a gunner with a big ego, in this twin stick dungeon crawler.

Controls:

WASD (or arrows) / Left Stick - Move

Right Stick /Mouse - Aim

Space / Left Trigger - Spot Dodge

Left Mouse Button / Right Trigger - Shoot

Right Mouse Button/Left Bumper - Melee

Future Plans:

This demo's a bit on the short side, but we plan to update it with more content.

As for going forward, here's the plan:

  • More levels to the dungeon 
  • Two more characters to play as
    • Ava - The level-headed and calm melee specialist
    • Torchvantos - The brave and stoic heavy-weapons specialist
  • Control Customization 
  • More bosses!
  • More enemies!
  • More puzzles!
